com.microsoft.azure.storage.core

Class BaseRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.storage.core.BaseRequest

  • public final class BaseRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    RESERVED FOR INTERNAL USE. The Base Request class for the protocol layer.

      • create

        public static java.net.HttpURLConnection create(java.net.URI uri,
                                                RequestOptions options,
                                                UriQueryBuilder builder,
                                                OperationContext opContext)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                StorageException
        Creates the specified resource. Note request is set to setFixedLengthStreamingMode(0); Sign with 0 length.
        Parameters:
        uri - the request Uri.
        options - A RequestOptions object that specifies execution options such as retry policy and timeout settings for the operation.
        builder - the UriQueryBuilder for the request
        opContext - an object used to track the execution of the operation
        Returns:
        a HttpURLConnection to perform the operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error opening the connection
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if there is an improperly formated URI
        StorageException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • signRequestForBlobAndQueue

        public static void signRequestForBlobAndQueue(java.net.HttpURLConnection request,
                                              Credentials credentials,
                                              java.lang.Long contentLength,
                                              OperationContext opContext)
                                       throws java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                                              StorageException
        Signs the request appropriately to make it an authenticated request for Blob and Queue.
        Parameters:
        request - a HttpURLConnection for the operation.
        credentials - the credentials to use for signing.
        contentLength - the length of the content written to the output stream, -1 if unknown.
        opContext - an object used to track the execution of the operation
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the credentials key is invalid.
        StorageException
